section.title: Adverbs of frequency
section.sectiontitle: We use never, not often, sometimes, often, usually, always + the Present simple to say how often we do something.
section.text1: We watch television five times a week.
section.text1a: We often watch television in the evening.
section.text2: Ana plays tennis with me three times a month.
section.sectiontitle2: We usually put the adverb before the verb but after the verb be.
section.text3: Nicolas goes to school on Saturday.
section.text3a: Nicolas often goes to school on Saturday.
